data.text: @politicseastmid @HeatherWheeler @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis @Zuffar_Haq Bus services cut to the bone, Care Homes closing down , carers workin for the council not even gettin the basic living wage yet Cllr Barry too busy looking after his wine business meanwhile libraries under threat & Heather Wheeler thinks there’s no homeless people in the county
@Zuffar_Haq @MsSarahGatford @politicseastmid @tonyroe They shouldn’t have taken them from this route full-stop.
@MsSarahGatford @politicseastmid @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis Yes they will reinstate the route ASAP as soon as rolling stock arrives.
@politicseastmid @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis @Zuffar_Haq Thanks for covering the #savematlocknottsraillink campaign! https://t.co/T4ZhzLVcfb
@politicseastmid @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis @Zuffar_Haq Great piece on the call for reinstatement of the train between Nottingham & Matlock @tonyroe

@politicseastmid @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis @Zuffar_Haq Now just a rehash of last weeks stories! Shame we in the East Mids don't get a live prog to discuss current events as they do in the West Mids & most other regions!!

@politicseastmid @tonyroe @CllrBarryLewis @Zuffar_Haq Obviously pre-recorded show but it would have been good if you could have asked Cllr Lewis why DCC wasted £28,500 resurfacing (and then removing the materials) a track in the Peak District (Pindale) 

https://t.co/8Se7m1hRT1
